# Ansible Role: Sendmail

An Ansible role that installs [Sendmail](http://www.sendmail.co.uk/sm/open_source/download) on RHEL/CentOS and Debian/Ubuntu.


## Requirements

None.


## Role Variables

None.


## Dependencies

None.


## Example Playbook

```
- hosts: servers
  roles:
     - { role: hashbangcode.sendmail }
```
